comments.comment: As a retired individual living in a residential area, I value the peace and quiet that comes with the current height limit. Increasing it to 65 feet could disrupt the neighborhood's character and impact property values negatively.

As a resident living in a nearby residential zone, I am concerned about how the increased height limit could potentially impact the character of our neighborhood and property values. It is important to maintain the current regulations to preserve the community's charm and avoid overcrowding.

As a resident living relatively close to the rezoning area, I am concerned about the impact a height limit increase to 65 feet could have on the character of our community. Property values may also be affected negatively.
As a resident living nearby, I am concerned that the increased height limit will disrupt the harmony and character of our neighborhood. It may also pose a threat to our property values.
As a long-time resident in the area, I value the current community character and worry that increasing the height limit could lead to overcrowding and overshadowing of surrounding properties.
